thread.title: Mum brings child to STRIPPER birthday party where half-naked man simulates sex on woman - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Mum brings child to STRIPPER birthday party where half-naked man simulates sex on woman - Mirror Online

author: Nicholas Bieber
title: Mum brings child to STRIPPER birthday party where half-naked man simulates sex on woman - Mirror Online
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Disturbing footage of a stripper simulating sex on a woman at a birthday party right in front of a small CHILD has surfaced online. 
The video, posted on YouTube, shows a party in full swing as a half-naked man carries out his act on the woman celebrating her birthday. 
Nothing seems out of the ordinary at first, as the man - wearing only his underwear - lifts the woman up and bounces her up and down in front of a room of watching guests. 
But when he lays the woman onto her back on a chair, while holding her legs up and simulating sex, the camera pans then towards the crowd and shows a tiny child standing at the front. Read More Shocking moment a father throws tiny little son into a lake in attempt to teach him to swim the hard way At one point, the small child can be seen standing just a metre away from the pair (Photo: Cantstop hip hop worlwide/Youtube) 
Standing just a metre away holding her hands together, the child - believed to be a girl who was taken to the party by her mum - watches on in shock as the man continues to grind against the woman. 
The 35-second video then ends with the man starting to undress the woman - who was believed to have been celebrating her 29th birthday, as balloons in the background suggest. Read More Freaky footage shows TV reporter predicting motorbike crash seconds before it actually happens The stripper acted out sex on the woman right in front of the girl (Photo: Cantstop hip hop worlwide/Youtube) 
It is not known where the party took place, although the author 'Can't Stop Hip Hop Worldwide' who posted the video - which was reportedly a live broadcast before being posted on YouTube - is based in the US. Like us on Facebook
